content:
Add a Customer Story to an Account, Contact, Household, or Opportunity page layout using a Visualforce component. Display a timeline of all interactions with a customer in a single, chronological feed.

Before you begin:

Configure the objects displayed in the customer story. See Configure the Objects Displayed in a Customer Story.
Create the Visualforce component for a new Customer Story you want to add to a new page layout.

To add a customer story to a page:

Go to Setup > Object Manager.
Click the Label of the object where you want to add the Customer Story.
Select Visualforce Pages from the object palette.
Drag Section onto the page layout and set properties:
Section Name: The section heading that appears on the record detail page.
Display Section Header On: Specifies where the section heading appears.
Layout: Select 1-Column.

Drag one of the following items onto the new section:

AccountStories
ContactStories
HouseholdStories
OpportunityStories

Set Visualforce Page Properties:
Height (in pixels): at least 280px.
Select Show Scrollbars.

Click Save.
title: Adding Customer Stories as Visualforce Components
